name: Acceleration Co-op
overview:
Acceleration Co-op is a global, filtered, virtual community of industry veterans and domain experts, motivated to focus on your challenges.

Value proposition: “Cross the finish-line faster, with less expenditure of capital, and fewer mistakes and missteps along the way - by leveraging the experience and market wisdom of our expert community.”

Goal: help entrepreneurs create successful new ventures; micro-cap companies grow faster; and expanding businesses attack new markets and new countries.

Who is it for? Acceleratees: Our crowd of experts is particularly valuable for a business attacking something new: new markets, new geographies or a new venture. In those circumstances, the management team is often on a steep learning curve or is incomplete, and the right inputs at the right time from the right experts can save years of hard work and $millions.
